results.message: LICENSE.txt is not needed in a skill — agents may load it into their context window, taking space from your actual task (Anthropic best practices: skills should only contain files that directly support agent functionality)
unknown directory: agents/ (contains 1 file) — agents using the standard skill structure won't discover these files; should this be assets/?
description has 10 comma-separated segments, most very short — this looks like a keyword list; per the spec, the description should concisely describe what the skill does and when to use it
references/prompt-template.md has an unclosed code fence starting at line 98 — this may cause agents to misinterpret everything after it as code
